definition: thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions

sentences.english: Tinea cruris is a fungal pruritic dermatitis in the inguinal region.
sentences.chinese: 股癬是一種真菌在腹股溝區的瘙癢性皮炎。

sentences.chinese: 把內側的腹股溝拉向盆骨。

sentences.english: Objective To summary the experience of diagnosis and treatment of incarcerated inguinal hernia in newborns .
sentences.chinese: 目的總結新生兒嵌頓性腹股溝斜疝的診治經驗。

sentences.english: Unilateral inguinal lymphadenopathy is usually a response to infection of an ipsilateral lower extremity.

sentences.chinese: 結果髂腹股溝區存在着豐富的血供。

sentences.english: Objective To analysis the results of treating the both-column fractures of acetabulum via ilioinguinal approach.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析經髂腹股溝入路治療髖臼雙柱骨折的療效。

sentences.english: A 35-day-old male infant was scheduled for bilateral inguinal herniorrhaphy.
sentences.chinese: 一個三十五天大的幼兒接受二溝腹股溝疝氣門診手術。

sentences.english: Teeth are as important as the groin and armpits.
sentences.chinese: 牙齒同腹股溝和腋窩一樣重要。

sentences.english: Women can use a pointed toe front kick to strike an attacker in the groin.
sentences.chinese: 婦女可以用腳趾尖前踢在腹股溝罷工攻擊。

sentences.english: Objective:To investigate the treatment of operation of the inguinal hernias.

sentences.english: Instead , apply warm compresses to the neck , chest wall and groin.

sentences.english: Another common location for it is the inguinal area and spermatic cord.
sentences.chinese: 其他常見部位包括腹股溝區和精索。

sentences.english: Groin hernia presents a low incidence but relatively high strangulation rate in female patients.
sentences.chinese: 女性腹股溝疝發病率低，但易併發嵌頓及滑動疝。
